```{r setup}
library(cryptoQuotes)
```


### Futures market

```{r, eval=FALSE}
## get OHLC data
## from binance futures
## market with daily pips
ATOMUSDT <- cryptoQuotes::getQuote(
  ticker   = 'ATOMUSDTM',
  source   = 'binance',
  futures  = TRUE,
  interval = '15m',
  from     = '2023-10-01',
  to       = '2023-10-02'
)
```


The USDT denominated ATOM, can be charted directly via the `chart`-function, for a quick overview.

```{r, include = FALSE, message=FALSE, echo=FALSE}
### get data from kucoin
### from the internal data set
ATOMUSDT <- cryptoQuotes:::internalTest[[1]][[2]]
```


```{r, out.width="100%",fig.align='center',fig.height=5}
## Create a chart
cryptoQuotes::chart(
  ATOMUSDT,
  deficiency = FALSE
)
```


### Spot market


```{r, eval=FALSE}
## get OHLC data
## from Kucoin futures
## market with daily pips
ATOMUSDT <- cryptoQuotes::getQuote(
  ticker   = 'ATOM-USDT',
  source   = 'kucoin',
  futures  = FALSE,
  interval = '15m',
  from     = '2023-10-01',
  to       = '2023-10-02'
)
```


The USDT denominated ATOM, can be charted directly via the `chart`-function, for a quick overview.

```{r, include = FALSE, message=FALSE, echo=FALSE}
### get data from kucoin
### from the internal data set
ATOMUSDT <- cryptoQuotes:::internalTest[[2]][[1]]
```


```{r, out.width="100%",fig.align='center',fig.height=5}
## Create a chart
cryptoQuotes::chart(
  ATOMUSDT,
  deficiency = TRUE
)
```
